Key Match Events: DR Congo took the lead in the 37th minute
Egypt equalized in the first minute of additional time
The match was forced into a penalty shootout
Mpasi Nzau became a hero by sending his fellow shot-stopper the wrong way with a clinical finish to win it for Congo
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Leopards, who last won the AFCON in 1974
Egypt have been eliminated from the tournament at the round of 16 stage for the second time in three tournaments
Others: DR Congo will face Guinea on February 2, 2024 in the quarterfinals
